page.title: 01THE GENERAL REVIEW
page.content: The area comprises the north- eastern sector of Knutsford which is divided into the housing areas of Shaw Heath, Cross Town and Longridge. Shaw Heath is an established council estate, Longridge is the Manchester overspill estate while Cross Town is a mixture of owner occupied and council houses. The other main centre of population is the village of Mobberley which lies abreast the Knutsford to Wilmslow Road. There are two main areas of industry. The Parkgate and Longridge Industrial Estates consist of a variety of small industrial units. The village of Mobberley is dominated by Ilford Photographic works which has recently undergone massive expansion. The largest part of the area is agricultural land.
